main event: An unidentified object was sighted in Albuquerque, New Mexico on May 30, 1962.
interesting points: The object changed colors between pink, dark gray, and silvery-white., It moved rapidly and was tracked by radar., The object was estimated to be 50 feet in diameter and traveled at speeds over 600 mph., The observation lasted for 21 minutes., A civilian made the initial sighting before military confirmation.
